content: Which can be the incorrect characteristics or features of constructor in Java?

options.label: A
options.content: Constructor’s name must be exactly the same as the class name in which it is defined. It must end with a pair of simple braces.

options.label: B
options.content: Java constructor may or may not contain parameters. Parameters are local variables to receive value (data) from outside into a constructor.

options.label: A
options.content: The constructor should have any return type even void also because if there is a no return type then JVM would consider as a method, not a constructor.

options.label: D
options.content: It is always called and executed only once per object. This means that when an object of a class is created, constructor is called. When we create second object, the constructor is again called during the second time.

content: Which of these statements about recoverable schedules is true?

options.label: A
options.content: In a recoverable schedule, if a transaction T commits, then any other transaction that Tread from must also have committed.

options.label: A
options.content: In a recoverable schedule, no transaction will ever be aborted because a transactionthat it read from has aborted.

content: Which of these statements about serializable schedules is true?

options.label: A
options.content: Every serializable schedule contains no conflicting actions.
